experience.description: FinAccel is a financial technology company with Kredivo “Buy now, Pay later” as the flagship product.
Travlr is travel platform that enabling travellers to inspired, discover, plan, book and share their holidays on one platform.
Midtrans provides complete payment solutions tailored for the business, simplify the payments process.
Ice House is a mobile development firm which applies breakthrough technology to build innovative user experiences.
JustCommodity, now Allegro, an enterprise CTRM software and advanced analytics empower companies on commodities area.
